verses.verse: Being therefore <WG3767> justified <WG1344> by <WG1537> faith, <WG4102> we have <WG2192> peace <WG1515> with <WG4314> God <WG2316> through <WG1223> our <WG2257> Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ; <WG5547>

through <WG1223> whom <WG3739> we also <WG2532> have <WG2192> our access <WG4318> by <WG1223> faith <WG4102> into <WG1519> this <WG3778> grace <WG5485> in <WG1909> which <WG1722> we stand. <WG2476> We rejoice <WG2744> in <WG1909> hope <WG1680> of the glory <WG1391> of God. <WG2316>

<WG1161> Not <WG3756> only <WG3440> this, <WG235> but we also <WG2532> rejoice <WG2744> in <WG1722> our sufferings, <WG2347> knowing <WG1492> that <WG3754> suffering <WG2347> works <WG2716> perseverance; <WG5281>
and <WG1161> perseverance, <WG5281> proven character; <WG1382> and <WG1161> proven character, <WG1382> hope: <WG1680>

and <WG1161> hope <WG1680> <WG2617> doesn't <WG3756> disappoint <WG2617> us, <WG3754> because God <WG2316>'s love <WG26> has been poured out <WG1632> into <WG1722> our <WG2257> hearts <WG2588> through <WG1223> the <WG4151> Holy <WG40> Spirit <WG4151> who was given <WG1325> to us. <WG2254>
For <WG1063> while <WG5607> we <WG2257> were <WG5607> yet <WG2089> weak, <WG772> at the right <WG2596> time <WG2540> Christ <WG5547> died <WG599> for <WG5228> the ungodly. <WG765>

For <WG1063> one <WG5100> will <WG599> hardly <WG3433> die <WG599> for <WG5228> a righteous man. <WG1342> Yet <WG1063> perhaps <WG5029> for <WG5228> a righteous person <WG18> someone <WG5100> would <WG5111> even <WG2532> dare <WG5111> to die. <WG599>

But <WG1161> God <WG2316> commends <WG4921> his <WG1438> own love <WG26> toward <WG1519> us, <WG2248> in that <WG3754> while <WG5607> we <WG2257> were <WG5607> yet <WG2089> sinners, <WG268> Christ <WG5547> died <WG599> for <WG5228> us. <WG2257>

Much <WG4183> more <WG3123> then, <WG3767> being <WG1344> now <WG3568> justified <WG1344> by <WG1722> his <WG846> blood, <WG129> we will be saved <WG4982> from <WG575> God <WG3709>'s wrath through <WG1223> him. <WG846>

For <WG1063> if, <WG1487> while we were <WG5607> enemies, <WG2190> we were reconciled <WG2644> to God <WG2316> through <WG1223> the death <WG2288> of his <WG846> Son, <WG5207> much <WG4183> more, <WG3123> being reconciled, <WG2644> we will be saved <WG4982> by <WG1722> his <WG846> life. <WG2222>

<WG1161> Not <WG3756> only <WG3440> so, <WG235> but we <WG2744> also <WG2532> rejoice <WG2744> in <WG1722> God <WG2316> through <WG1223> our <WG2257> Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547> through <WG1223> whom <WG3739> we have <WG2983> now <WG3568> received <WG2983> the reconciliation. <WG2643>

Therefore, <WG5124> as <WG5618> sin <WG266> entered <WG1525> into <WG1519> the world <WG2889> through <WG1223> one <WG1520> man, <WG444> and <WG2532> death <WG2288> through <WG1223> sin; <WG266> and <WG2532> so <WG3779> death <WG2288> passed <WG1330> to <WG1519> all <WG3956> men, <WG444> because <WG1909> <WG3739> all <WG3956> sinned. <WG264>

For <WG1063> until <WG891> the law, <WG3551> sin <WG266> was <WG2258> in <WG1722> the world; <WG2889> but <WG1161> sin <WG266> is <WG1677> not <WG3756> charged <WG1677> when there is <WG5607> no <WG3361> law. <WG3551>

Nevertheless <WG235> death <WG2288> reigned <WG936> from <WG575> Adam <WG76> until <WG3360> Moses, <WG3475> even <WG2532> over <WG1909> those whose sins <WG264> weren't <WG3361> <WG1909> like <WG3667> Adam <WG76>'s disobedience, <WG3847> who <WG3739> is <WG2076> a foreshadowing <WG5179> of <WG3847> him who was to come. <WG3195>

But <WG235> the free gift <WG5486> isn't <WG3756> like <WG5613> the trespass. <WG3900> For <WG1063> if <WG1487> by the trespass <WG3900> of the one <WG1520> the many <WG4183> died, <WG599> much <WG4183> more <WG3123> did the grace <WG5485> of God, <WG2316> and <WG2532> the gift <WG1431> by <WG1722> the grace <WG5485> of the one <WG1520> man, <WG444> Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547> abound <WG4052> to <WG1519> the many. <WG4183>

The <WG2532> gift <WG1434> is not <WG3756> as <WG5613> through <WG1223> one <WG1520> who sinned: <WG264> for <WG1063> the judgment <WG2917> came by <WG1537> one <WG1520> to <WG1519> condemnation, <WG2631> but <WG1161> the free gift <WG5486> came of <WG1537> many <WG4183> trespasses <WG3900> to <WG1519> justification. <WG1345>

For <WG1063> as <WG5618> through <WG1223> the one <WG1520> man <WG444>'s disobedience <WG3876> many <WG4183> were made <WG2525> sinners, <WG268> even <WG3779> so <WG2532> through <WG1223> the obedience <WG5218> of the one, <WG1520> many <WG4183> will <WG2525> be made <WG2525> righteous. <WG1342>

that <WG2443> as <WG5618> sin <WG266> reigned <WG936> in <WG1722> death, <WG2288> even <WG2532> so <WG3779> grace <WG5485> might <WG936> reign <WG936> through <WG1223> righteousness <WG1343> to <WG1519> eternal <WG166> life <WG2222> through <WG1223> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> our <WG2257> Lord. <WG2962>
